module.caption: ATSHA204 Example 2 for Security Xplained
module.info: Provides an application example of the ATSHA204 component. In an infinite loop, sends a Mac command to an ATSHA204 device serving as a client, and sends a CheckMac command with the Mac challenge / response data to a second ATSHA204 device that serves as a host. Helper functions log the commands and responses through the USB-CDC board controller in hex-ascii.
